channel.title: Compiler help?
channel.description:
So I downloaded a clean 317 and I want to build up the server and basically I have no clue how to get the compiler to work because ive never dealt with one like this... Is there any way you guys could tell me how to get it to run properly? Now, I have restored it to the original compiler because everything ive tried didn't work. It always says "Java is out of date" I'm using jre7 and apparently others that have used this source said that they used jre7 and it worked for them So I have no clue. so if you could please tell me what to put and where to put it? Please help! (Ive checked the Compiler error thread and still couldn't find it out)
Script of compiler bellow: [code]@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit[/code]
Screenie of what happens when I run it: [img]http://i.imgur.com/cvia15b.png[/img]

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @jo_yo_mama1 jo yo mama1
item.description:
@jo_yo_mama1 wrote:

[quote=“dillo1000, post:2, topic:549207”]Have you got Java JDK? Since I’m pretty sure they normally run of JDK? And also it says this

for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") [/quote]

I have jre7 not jdk, so do I change the 1jdk to jre7?

Read full topic

Have you got Java JDK? Since I’m pretty sure they normally run of JDK? And also it says this

for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")

item.title: Compiler help?
item.dc:creator: @jo_yo_mama1 jo yo mama1
item.description:
@jo_yo_mama1 wrote:

So I downloaded a clean 317 and I want to build up the server and basically I have no clue how to get the compiler to work because ive never dealt with one like this… Is there any way you guys could tell me how to get it to run properly?
Now, I have restored it to the original compiler because everything ive tried didn’t work. It always says “Java is out of date” I’m using jre7 and apparently others that have used this source said that they used jre7 and it worked for them So I have no clue. so if you could please tell me what to put and where to put it? Please help!
(Ive checked the Compiler error thread and still couldn’t find it out)

Script of compiler bellow:

@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit

Screenie of what happens when I run it:
